page.title: 13 HEALTH
page.content: There is no National Health on Sark. People have to pay for all medicines and visits to the doctor.When you are ill he is willing to come to your house at whatever time you think you need him.If you are very ill he will phone the lighthouse and it will phone Guernsey for the Flying Christine, the ambulance launch.The Sark ambulance which is a small caravan will collect you and take you to the harbour.The Flying Christine will take to Guernsey to the hospital because we have no hospital on Sark.We have no dentist. From time to time a dentist comes from Guernsey to give us a check up and make further appointments in Guernsey.
